articles.title: Tuberculosis: First time infections rise to 30-year high - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The infectious lung disease TB was the top two global killer in 2022 after COVID. The highest rates were in South Asia. | Health
articles.content: An estimated 10.6 million people developed tuberculosis (TB) in 2022. A majority of those 7.5 million people were diagnosed with the airborne lung disease for the first time. This is significant beca… [+5198 chars]

articles.title: AI in your pocket: Samsung Galaxy S to feature real-time phone call translator - asianews.network
articles.description: The new real-time call translation function would work as a “personal translator,” and will be integrated into the device’s call feature.
articles.content:
SEOUL – Samsung Electronics flagship Galaxy S smartphones will offer a real-time translation function for phone calls, the tech giant said Thursday.
